Or by appointment (email: fabio.giglietto@uniurb.it)

tutorials.title: Introduction to R for Communication Research
tutorials.description: A beginner's guide to R programming for communication and media research

tutorials.title: Social Media Data Analysis with Python
tutorials.description: Tutorial series on collecting and analyzing social media data with Python

teaching.supervision:
I am available to supervise Bachelor's and Master's theses in the following areas:

- Digital Media Analysis
- Social Media Research
- Computational Social Science
- Media Studies
- Online Misinformation and Disinformation

If you are interested in working with me, please email me with a brief outline of your research interests.
